about-us-desc: Victoria is an application targeting women who want to be self-employed and have a carrier, the application developed by an Egyptian company called Egyptian Saudi For Telecom and Information Technology Acronym to 'EST-IT. 'for more info kindly visit  www.egyst-it.com
victoria-inovation-desc: Being a part of the taxi services in the future and looking forward to the next, by growing our service to give drivers and customers a unique opportunity. And promote the laws of women in society
